sense.gloss: background (of an incident, situation, etc.), circumstances, context
reverse, rear side, back (e.g. of a chair), spine (of a book)
to be burdened with, to take responsibility for
to have (something) in the background, to be in front (of something)
to be conceited, to think highly of oneself
number on back of player's shirt, uniform number, shirt number
standing on tiptoe and stretching one's back to make oneself taller, stretching oneself
overreaching oneself, overstretching oneself, trying to do something beyond one's ability, pushing to the limit
breach of trust, malfeasance, malpractice, misappropriation
to run counter to, to go against, to disobey, to infringe
antinomy, self-contradiction, either-or situation, choice between mutually exclusive alternatives
muscles of the back, back muscles
standing with one's back to water (river, lake, etc.)
opposite sides of the same coin

r_ele.r: どんぐりのせいくらべ

sense.gloss: having very little difference between one another, being much of a muchness, being more or less the same, height comparison among acorns
pointless competition (between two equally unimpressive parties), pissing contest

r_ele.r: ちゅうにくちゅうぜい

sense.gloss: to turn (one's face) away, to avert (one's eyes)
apostasy, renunciation (e.g. of a religion), defection
corruption, immorality, lapse from virtue, fall from virtue
pretending to obey but secretly betraying (someone)
striking with the back of the sword
back and front, opposition in the heart

sdata.j: ↑勤務↑↓きんむ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓の↑警官↑↓けいかん↓は、↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓のお↑年寄↑↓としよ↓りが↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑背後↑↓はいご↓に↑近↑↓ちか↓づいてくるのを↑感↑↓かん↓じた。

sdata.j: ↑違反↑↓いはん↓のスピードを↑出↑↓だ↓して、↑突↑↓つ↓っ↑走↑↓ぱし↓っていた↑車↑↓くるま↓がブレーキをかけたが、↑空回↑↓からまわ↓りして、↑運転↑↓うんてん↓↑手↑↓しゅ↓があっというまもなく、トラックの↑背後↑↓はいご↓に、もろにぶつかった。
